page.title: 08Methodist Chapel, Middlezoy
page.content: In Middlezoy we have two Chapels.The newer one was built in 1898 and was not called a chapel but it was called the Methodist Church and some people still call it that.Every Sunday Mrs Carpenter runs a small school for children to go and learn about God.The old chapel has now been converted into a house for people to live in.The Sunday School runs from 10.00am to 11.00am.We have two groups of children the smaller ones go together and the older ones go together.Mrs Carpenter takes the younger ones in the corner of the room and the older ones are taken by Mrs Steward or Mrs Mc Cullum. The old chapel was built in 1847 but this one was called the Methodist Chapel.The Sunday School was started up in 1887 and is still going strong.
